question.title: Getting error SQL Server did not return a response. The connection has been closed
question.body:
I am connecting MS SQL server 2008 database using jdk 1.8.371 and spring boot 2.1.5. i am getting error "SQL Server did not return a response. The connection has been closed". i am not getting data from database below is a code

Databse detailsjdbcUrl: jdbc:sqlserver://IPAddress:1433;databaseName=MyDatabase;integratedSecurity=false;encrypt=true;trustServerCertificate=true;sslProtocol=TLSv1
driver-class-name: com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver

Class.forName(dbDriver);
try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(dbUrl, dbUsername, dbPassword)) {
    try (PreparedStatement cStmt = conn.prepareCall(dbQuery)) {
        try (ResultSet dbSet = cStmt.executeQuery()) {
            while (dbSet.next()) {
                    TransId = dbSet.getString("TRANS_ID");
                }
            }
        }
    }

My query :

Select TRANS_ID From Transactionlog;

I disabled jdk.tls.disabledAlgorithms=None in java.security file after that i am able to connect database but not able to fetch data. i also set system.setProperties but not able to get data
